document.full_text: andy roddick and 2003 french open champion juan carlos ferrero withdrew from the year's second grand slam tournament thursday night after failing to recover from right shoulder injuries.
document.title: roddick, ferrero pull out of french open
lines_and_colors: andy roddick and 2003 french open champion juan carlos ferrero withdrew from the year's second grand slam tournament thursday night after failing to recover from right shoulder injuries.
